selection_reason: Neha Reddy has relevant experience (3+ years) in QA roles, including manual and automation testing, which aligns with the job requirements. She possesses key technical skills such as Selenium, TestNG, Postman, SQL, and Cypress, as well as experience in UAT, regression, and integration testing. Additionally, she holds an ISTQB Advanced Level certification, which meets the preferred education criteria. Her leadership experience and ability to collaborate further enhance her suitability for the role. The only minor gap is the lack of explicit mention of JIRA, but her overall profile strongly aligns with the job description.
